name: Haraka
description:
HarakaPlus is a modern transportation platform designed to address the transportation challenges faced by Rwandan citizens.  It offers a convenient, affordable, and environmentally friendly alternative to existing options like expensive moto-taxis and unreliable public buses.  By leveraging a 100% electric fleet of shared shuttles, HarakaPlus provides multiple transportation services, including business transit, daily commutes, school/university shuttles, vehicle rentals, and event transportation.  The platform allows users to easily book rides through a user-friendly online reservation system and mobile apps (iOS and Android), providing real-time GPS tracking for enhanced security and peace of mind.  HarakaPlus aims to revolutionize the Rwandan transportation landscape by offering a sustainable and efficient solution that caters to a wide range of transportation needs.

The target users for HarakaPlus are diverse and include Rwandan residents, businesses, schools, universities, and event organizers.  Individuals can use the platform for their daily commutes, while businesses can utilize the service for employee transportation.  Schools and universities can leverage HarakaPlus for student shuttles, and event organizers can book transportation for attendees.  The platform caters to users seeking a reliable, affordable, and eco-friendly transportation alternative, addressing the need for a more efficient and sustainable transportation system in Rwanda.

Key features of the HarakaPlus platform include a comprehensive online booking system accessible via web and mobile apps, real-time GPS tracking of all vehicles, and support for multiple service types.  The user-friendly interface allows users to easily select their desired service, specify pickup and drop-off locations, choose preferred times, and make secure payments.  The real-time tracking feature provides transparency and allows users to monitor the location of their shuttle.  The platform also includes administrative features for managing the fleet, scheduling routes, and handling customer support.

The HarakaPlus platform will be built using a modern technology stack, including Next.js 15 for the frontend framework, TypeScript for enhanced code maintainability, and TailwindCSS for styling.  Bun will be the primary package manager, with NPM as a fallback.  Lucide React will provide the icon set, and Netlify will host the application.  A robust backend solution, yet to be determined, will be required to handle data management, user authentication, booking processing, and real-time communication with the mobile apps.  The platform must be scalable to accommodate a growing user base and ensure high availability and performance.

The user experience will be intuitive and seamless across all devices.  Users will be able to easily navigate the platform, book rides, track their shuttles, and manage their accounts.  The mobile apps will provide location-based services and push notifications to keep users informed about their rides.  A clear and concise user interface will prioritize ease of use and accessibility.  Success will be measured by user adoption rates, customer satisfaction, the number of completed rides, and a reduction in reliance on less sustainable transportation options.  Ultimately, HarakaPlus aims to become the leading transportation service provider in Rwanda, contributing to a greener and more efficient transportation ecosystem.
